entry.summary:
Author: Ella_Katz

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,185Chapters: 3/23Kudos: 39

entry.title: What a Bittersweet Christmas
entry.summary:
Author: Amur_adonis1731

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,803Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 6

Summary: Bruce Wayne, ever the emotionally constipated man, sat in his chair.It wasn’t his chair at W.E. where he ditzed, himbo’d, and Brucie’d his way through social calls, fooling every soul into falling for his outgoing, peacock-like persona.It wasn’t his chair in the Batcave, where he analyzed the trails of long-forgotten cold cases or a string of messy murder scenes, maintaining his broody, self-sacrificing, and ever-so-paranoid bat vigilante persona for colleagues, media, and family alike.It wasn’t his chair in his sitting room, where he was often found on slow mornings, usually nursing a steaming cup of green tea and sat on the worn leather couch with the latest edition of the New York Times crossword, word search, or other puzzle, opening himself to his family and friends with the simple offer of space and Bruce.It was, instead, a chair in his study, where only his family was permitted to enter—a safe space and a haven of silence, away from the bustle of people and the rush of crime.

entry.title: Blood and Stones
entry.summary:
Author: salvame

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 467Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 1

Summary: Before Gotham had a Dark Knight, it had a Queen. Lady Gotham, the last Vampire Goddess, made a pact with Thomas and Martha Wayne: a child, born of blood and shadow, in exchange for a debt never meant to be paid. That child grew into Bruce Wayne. He became a man. A father. A protector.But blood bargains do not vanish with time, and Lady Gotham has never forgotten her son.

entry.title: Poltergeists For Sidekicks
entry.summary:
Author: EventualToast

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,887Chapters: 4/9Kudos: 17

Summary: In most worlds, Batman has a cavalry, a unit of people who defend Gotham alongside him. In most worlds, Bruce Wayne has a family. There's surprise pancakes and cobbled together family dinners, and the rare laughter of a group of people who are all incredibly busy but determined to make time for each other.This is not most worlds.

entry.title: And You, My Father, There on the Sad Height
entry.summary:
Author: notalegalist

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,762Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 55

Summary: Batman had long become resistant to Scarecrow’s Fear Toxin. Like he did with every villain he encountered, he had now had years of training combatting the vicious reagent, having developed multiple contingencies and mental tricks to escape its grasp. Yet, nothing had prepared him for a nearly imperceptible and slow-acting version of the drug.The Justice League begins to learn what the Dark Knight with no restraint looks like.

entry.title: Cursed Child
entry.summary:
Author: J4YYYZ

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,725Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 110

Summary: Bruce gets de-aged into a 16-year old after being hit by an alien weapon from an attempted invasion.The 16 year old who trained under the LOA.The 16 year old who ran away from Alfred.The 16 year old who is emotionally constipated.The 16 year old who was manipulated into something else.The 16 year old who never had a childhood.Bruce tries to forget the days of when he trained under Ra's, but small habits and reflexes he thought were long gone start to resurface, along with memories being freshly remembered as if it was yesterday. It haunts him slowly, eating him out from the inside before taking action after playing with its food.

entry.title: Baby Birds
entry.summary:
Author: arkhams__knight

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,203Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 10

Summary: [ TITLE IS A PLACEHOLDER & A WORK IN PROGRESS. SUMMARY EXCERPT WILL LIKELY CHANGE WHEN MORE IS PUT OUT. ]“Good morning! I’m making some breakfast. You hungry at all?” Richard didn't answer, and the person walked into the hall in front of the large “doorway” of the living room. Whoever this was sighed, giving him an almost sympathetic look, before saying something else. “I get it. I wouldn't be hungry either.” They leaned against the wood doorframe, flashing a smile that was supposed to be comforting. “Your actual guardian is on his way. Bruce Wayne, you heard of him? I didn't think he was the kid type.. But, I think you’ll be pretty happy with him.”—Tim, Dick, Jason, and Damian are all young. Practically the same age. Somehow, they all end up with Bruce Wayne at the same time, and hearing Richard gets to be Robin, they all want in.

entry.title: Operation: Chaos on the Runway
entry.summary:
Author: Hasunohana

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,415Chapters: 7/10Kudos: 95

Summary: In an epic celebration for reaching 4 million subscribers on Cass and Steph's channel, the duo decides to host a livestream guaranteed to break the internet. Their grand plan? Revealing to the world that the mysterious dancer "C" is none other than Cassandra Cain Wayne.But this revelation barely scratches the surface of the night's most explosive moments. With every family member determined to help celebrate, the fun atmosphere quickly escalates into a wild dance competition - because when have the Waynes ever done anything without turning it into a rivalry?Secretly rehearsed choreographies, ruthless judges, and a side bet about their boyfriends' reaction times turn the night into an absolute spectacle. The Batfamily's legendary intensity meets chaotic fun in this unforgettable livestream event where every move could spark new memes and every reveal sends the fandom into meltdown.

entry.title: The Hundred Day Curse
entry.summary:
Author: SolaceInSpace

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 125,189Chapters: 33/?Kudos: 3,579

Summary: Gotham was literally cursed but no one believed Bruce. He took it upon himself to fix it and after decades of searching, that solution came to him in the form of a little blue vial. Bruce was to take the curse within himself to temper it into something manageable.He thinks the others would call him stupid and stop him if they knew about this, but (un)fortunately for Bruce, his family hasn't spoken to him for forever. There was no one here to stop him.He downed the liquid and woke up as his nine-year-old self.Ch3 Excerpt:“Mother, do you remember those funny clouds above people’s heads I told you about? Well, I’m doing something about them but the process is very lonely. Or not. I think it’s just me. I’m the problem. I can’t seem to get people to like me enough to stay. I know–-… I’m aware that it’s due to my own shortcomings but sometimes, it feels like even the worst monsters have people that love them and yet I have no one.”Bruce let out a humourless chuckle and rested his forehead on his knees.“I just wish there was someone that cared about me.”

entry.title: Bruce's Incidental Grandchild Acquisition
entry.summary:
Author: sleepberries

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,503Chapters: 2/6Kudos: 90

Summary: Bruce Wayne had long accepted that life with his adopted family would never be conventional—but he wasn’t prepared for the tidal wave of grandchildren. Batman may be prepared for Gotham’s criminals, but nothing prepared him for becoming Grandpa.  (Or, five times Bruce is underprepared for a grandchild and one time he's overprepared.)

entry.title: Sawdust Eaters
entry.summary:
Author: Anonymous

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 65,863Chapters: 16/?Kudos: 33

Summary: Adrien gets added to a family group chat and he's going to make it their problem.Things take a very interesting turn as this turns out to be no ordinary family. Dick is never going to be able to visit Paris. Tim might lose his mind. Jason is having a good time.A game of Cat & Mouse begins between Adrien and Tim. What was supposed to be a simple game of chase to spice up Adrien's depressing life, becomes a whirlwind romance between the two as they chase one another across Gotham.

entry.title: Long Live the Grit King
entry.summary:
Author: Mia_Da_Cat

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,555Chapters: 6/6Kudos: 93

Summary: Sequel to "The Gritty Wisdom of Jason Todd".The Bat-family has sworn fealty to their new, gritty, no-belly-button Batman. The problem? Jason is still high, and now they have to get him home.Follow the newly-dubbed "Grit Knights Council" as they hold sacred trials in the alley where Jason once stubbed his toe, perform the legendary "Gotham Brood Strut," and establish a new Batcave (the 'Grotto of Grit') in the wine cellar. Meanwhile, Bruce has seen the footage and is coming to reclaim his title. He is about to learn a terrible truth: You can't ground Batman.(Features 24 unhinged voicemails and a tragic eulogy for a donut.)

entry.title: Dome Protocol
entry.summary:
Author: ToTheLastWord

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 83,125Chapters: 11/12Kudos: 608

Summary: “I think he created the device for an end-of-the-world scenario,” Bruce said, voice carefully neutral. When a mysterious device sends the Batkids' future sons and daughters to the past, right in the middle of the cave, none of them is ready. Not the new kids, whose family as they know it is back in a different time, and certainly not Bruce's own children, too young to be parents.With the six now stuck in a time in which they don't exist yet, hurt by a future that will never be, the Batkids will have to decide what it truly means to be a family and how to face the ghosts of choices not yet taken.AKAThe Batkids meet their future children and everything gets complicated.- - - -Part of a series dedicated to the Batkids' kids, this is a STAND-ALONE fic.
